variants.Description in input context: The study focused on the A30P mutation and its impact on alpha-synuclein.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: The A30P mutation resulted in reduced FRET signals, indicating altered protein conformation and function.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: One-way ANOVA followed by Bonferroni's post hoc test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: FRET signals greater than the mean + 2 standard deviations of wild-type alpha-synuclein.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: FRET signals less than the mean - 2 standard deviations of wild-type alpha-synuclein.
